attributes.action: Stop all professional sport during lockdown to decrease the spread of Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Large numbers of people are meeting up, not social distancing or wearing masks such as football. this unnecessary gathering could endanger hundreds or thousands of lives
attributes.background: Stop all professional sports during lockdown to decease the spread of COVID-19

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban elite sports being played during lockdown 3
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566813
